evidence: Clear separation of concerns with models, views, and controllers in the app/ directory
Models defined in app/models.py with SQLAlchemy ORM classes
Views implemented in app/main/views.py and app/auth/views.py handling HTTP requests
Templates directory containing HTML templates for views
Controllers logic distributed across view modules handling routing and business logic
Blueprint-based modular structure with main, auth, and api modules
REST API endpoints organized separately in app/api/ following controller pattern
risks: Some business logic mixed with view logic in view modules
API controllers may have some overlap with traditional MVC controllers
Database models contain some business logic methods
